          <title>
            <string language="fr">Transmission de la lumière dans un verre</string>
            <string language="en">Light transmission in a glass</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Helle Übertragung in einem Glas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Transmissão clara em um vidro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trasmissione della luce in un vetro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελαφριά μετάδοση σε ένα γυαλί</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Transmisión ligera en un cristal</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration prouve qu'un matériel transparent tel que le verre permet à la lumière de passer à travers.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that a transparent material such as glass allows light to pass through.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">le verre</string>
            <string language="en">glass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière</string>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière transmise</string>
            <string language="en">transmitted light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">transparente</string>
            <string language="en">transparent</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß ein transparentes 
Material wie Glas Licht durch überschreiten läßt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que um material 
transparente tal como o vidro permite que a luz passe completamente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che un materiale 
trasparente quale vetro permette che la luce passi attraverso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι ένα διαφανές υλικό 
όπως το γυαλί επιτρέπει στο φως για να περάσει μέσω.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que un material 
transparente tal como cristal permite que la luz pase a través.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Glas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">übertragenes Licht</string>
          </keyword>
